CallTemplate.name: CallTemplate
CallTemplate.description: Represents a call script for users to read when making calls.

Description.description: The description of the call script.

HtmlBody.description: The body content of the call script.

LastReferencedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed a record that is related to this CallTemplate.

LastViewedDate.description: The time stamp that indicates when the current user last viewed this CallTemplate. If this value is null, this record might have been only referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the call script.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the call script.

TotalCalls.description: The total number of calls that use the CallTemplate.

TotalCallsCallBackLater.description: The total Call Back Later call results that use the CallTemplate.

TotalCallsLeftVoicemail.description: The total Left Voicemail call results that use the CallTemplate.

TotalCallsMeaningfulConnect.description: The total Meaningful Connect call results that use the CallTemplate.

TotalCallsNotInterested.description: The total Not Interested call results that use the CallTemplate.

TotalCallsUncategorized.description: The total uncategorized call results that use the CallTemplate.

TotalCallsUnqualified.description: The total Unqualified call results that use the CallTemplate.
